attributes.action: Abolish the LICENSE FEE for us who pay for DIGITAL VIEWING NOW!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I pay for digital viewing and get about 150 channels including the non advert channels, that, I might add, pay the license fee for, within my package, so why on earth am I STILL paying my license fee every year? It baffles me that we are STILL getting ripped off by the multi-million pounds profit maker when it should be included within my digital viewing package. I think its totally wrong to be RIPPED OFF in this way!! We should be given the choice to OPT OUT when we take on the digital contract! DO YOU AGREE? have your say and sign up NOW!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
